Inscription:
L(ucius) Vettius M(arci) [f(ilius)] / Maec(ia) Secun[dus] / Libarn[a] vet(eranus) le[g(ionis)] / VII
vivus [f]ecit si[bi] / et Vettiae L(uci) f(iliae) Ver[ae)] / et Vettiae L(uci) l(ibertae) S[---]
Translation:
Lucius Vetia Secundus, Mark's son, from the Maecia tribune, from the city of Libarna,
a veteran of the Seventh Legion, he made (raised) himself, Vetija Vera, his daughter, and Vetija S (….), freedmen.
